resources.string: Accomplished developer with history of success playing key role at all phases of software development lifecycle. Hands-on expertise in full stack development using Spring Boot, Microservices, React, SQL. Personable team player with talent for collaboration with diverse cross-functional teams.

Language: Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, Php, Python
Frameworks/web: Spring(Boot, MVC, Security), Hibernate, ReactJs, Angular 
Microservices/Cloud: PCF, Docker, Flyway, Kafka 
Databases: Oracle, PL/SQL, MySQL, MariaDB 
Tools: Intellij IDE, Maven, BitBucket, Pivotal, GitHub, GitLab, Gradle, UML

Dedicated Full Stack Developer with more than 4 years of hands-on experience streamlining enhancements and support for mobile and web applications. Analytic project leader who implements complex analysis and intricate software engineering to meet client requirements. Skilled in using technologies such as Java, Angular, React, Spring, Microservice, MS SQL, MariaDB, MySQL, J2EE, jQuery, Bootstrap, and Hibernate.
